title: kaN enna kaNNE
sahitya:
kaN enna kaNNE manakkaNNil ilangum kaNNanai kANAda


anupallavi

  paN enna paNNE satyabhAmai nAthanai pADi magizhAda
manakkaNNil ilangum kaNNanai kANAda


caraNam    kalai enna kalaiyE kalai karpanai tANDi arputam kANAda
nilaiyenna nilaiyE engum nilaiyAda nilaiyilE alaiyAda nillAda
manakkaNNil ilangum kaNNanai kANAda
